artist: Engraver: Giolomo Rossi the younger; Delineator: Giovanni Domenico Ferretti
description: 3/4 view waist up portrait of Alessandro Allori; holding artists pallet in proper left hand, brush in right hand; wearing smock and cap
inscription:
Signature, Title and Inscription

on sheet below image in black: [ALESSANDRO ALLORI/ detto il BRONZINO/ PITTORE/ Gio. Dom. Ferretti del.  Girolomo Rossi fe.]; in pencil: [1-20]
title: Portrait of Alessandro Allori
